enhanced_posts.text:
US #election infra & rules leave no room for #Trump to insert himself.
Yet that is exactly what he does right now: directing, dismantling & weaponizing agencies. He evades his responsibility for election security & the freedom to vote.
In short: he’s setting the stage for election subversion.
